item.title: CVE-2024-8513|2024-10-10T02:06:04.718Z -- quarka -- qa%20analytics%20%E2%80%93%20web%20analytics%20tool%20with%20heatmaps%20%26%20session%20replay%20across%20all%20pages
item.description: The QA Analytics â€“ Web Analytics Tool with Heatmaps & Session Replay Across All Pages plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the ajax_save_plugin_config() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.0.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the plugin's settings.
